about_the_game:
Sinister Hospital : Judge Harlan Story

In the dark forests of Duskwood town, an abandoned hospital rises like a ghost. Although "Sinister Hospital" had been closed for years, it still harbors dreadful secrets within. The player steps into the hospital to trace the footsteps of a group of lost children from the town's outskirts. However, inside awaits only a dark adventure and a quest for forgotten justice: Judge Harlan.

Chapter 1: Entrance

The game opens with the player navigating through the gloomy forests of Duskwood. Amidst old ruins and forgotten paths, the silhouette of the abandoned hospital catches the player's eye. Initial puzzles greet the player in this forest, such as gathering pieces of an old map to find the right path or deciphering ancient symbols to unlock hidden passages.

Chapter 2: Dollhouse of Horrors

Upon entering the hospital, the player finds themselves in a room resembling a dollhouse. It's filled with old and eerie-looking dolls. Some dolls provide clues to progress or are necessary to solve puzzles. However, some come to life and stalk the player through dark corridors.

Chapter 3: Traces of Judge Harlan

As the player delves deeper into the hospital, they begin to uncover traces of Judge Harlan. His story comes to life through horrifying diaries written on the walls and old records. However, during this quest, the player encounters more complex puzzles and dangerous traps. For example, hacking the hospital's old security system to open a passage or finding hidden keys in forgotten rooms.

Chapter 4: Dreadful Truth

As the player approaches unraveling Judge Harlan's secret and the hospital's dark past, puzzles become more challenging, and the dolls become more menacing. While delving into the mysterious world of dolls to uncover the truth, the player also encounters dark forces. For instance, getting lost in a maze guided by dolls or engaging in a challenging fight to defeat the puppet master.

Features:


You can examine or pick up items around you.


You can examine it as a detective.



Dolls Will Do Their Best to Scare You.


This hospital is not what you think, I think it is possessed by spirits


We need to find the mysterious codes to open the chest.


You have to deal with the puzzle and solve it.


Sinister Butler will never leave you alone. As if the other dolls weren't enough, this one will haunt you too.


Light sources are not unlimited, you must find the batteries hidden in the hospital.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains sudden sounds and scary visuals. It is strongly recommended that you prepare yourself for sudden events.

name: Sinister Hospital

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: In the dark forests of Duskwood town, an abandoned hospital rises ominously. Despite its closure years ago, "Sinister Hospital" harbors terrifying secrets. The player enters to follow the trail of a group of lost children from the town. There lies a dark journey and quest for justice: Judge Harlan.
